headline.main: Seat Swap May Have Saved Chapecoense Player's Life in Plane Crash
headline.print_headline: Seat Swap May Have Saved Chapecoense Player's Life in Plane Crash

docs.snippet: A Brazilian footballer who survived the air crash that killed most of his team in Colombia last month changed seats at the last minute after a team mate encouraged him to sit beside him, he said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Brazilian footballer who survived the air crash that killed most of his team in Colombia last month changed seats at the last minute after a team mate encouraged him to sit beside him, he said on Saturday.

headline.main: How a Putin Fan Overseas Pushed Pro-Trump Propaganda to Americans
headline.print_headline: How Putin Fan  Peddled Trump From Overseas

docs.snippet: With the explicit aim of getting Donald J. Trump elected, a website run by a far-right activist pumped out anti-Hillary Clinton hoaxes and drew tens of thousands of views....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the explicit aim of getting Donald J. Trump elected, a website run by a far-right activist pumped out anti-Hillary Clinton hoaxes and drew tens of thousands of views.

headline.main: Myanmar Military Launches Attacks on Ethnic Rebel Forces
headline.print_headline: Myanmar Military Launches Attacks on Ethnic Rebel Forces

docs.snippet: Myanmar government forces have started launching attacks on the headquarters of the military wing of one of the country's ethnic rebel groups, the group said Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Myanmar government forces have started launching attacks on the headquarters of the military wing of one of the country's ethnic rebel groups, the group said Saturday.

headline.main: Carlos Moya Joins Nadal's Coaching Team
headline.print_headline: Carlos Moya Joins Nadal's Coaching Team

docs.snippet: Fourteen-times grand slam champion Rafa Nadal has turned to fellow Mallorcan Carlos Moya in an attempt to revitalize his career, the 30-year-old Spaniard said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fourteen-times grand slam champion Rafa Nadal has turned to fellow Mallorcan Carlos Moya in an attempt to revitalize his career, the 30-year-old Spaniard said on Saturday.

headline.main: UNHCR Chief Says All Must Be Allowed Out of Aleppo, War Must Stop
headline.print_headline: UNHCR Chief Says All Must Be Allowed Out of Aleppo, War Must Stop

docs.snippet: All civilians must be allowed out of east Aleppo and Syria's war must stop immediately to prevent the city's suffering being repeated elsewhere, U.N. High Commissioner for Refugees Filippo Grandi said in a statement on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: All civilians must be allowed out of east Aleppo and Syria's war must stop immediately to prevent the city's suffering being repeated elsewhere, U.N. High Commissioner for Refugees Filippo Grandi said in a statement on Saturday.

headline.main: Trump Says Picks Mulvaney to Be White House Budget Director
headline.print_headline: Trump Says Picks Mulvaney to Be White House Budget Director

docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump said on Saturday he has chosen U.S. Representative Mick Mulvaney of South Carolina to be his White House budget director, turning to a fiscal conservative to help pursue his policy agenda....
docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump said on Saturday he has chosen U.S. Representative Mick Mulvaney of South Carolina to be his White House budget director, turning to a fiscal conservative to help pursue his policy agenda.

headline.main: Dozens Gather at Gay Pride in Conservative Montenegro
headline.print_headline: Dozens Gather at Gay Pride in Conservative Montenegro

docs.snippet: Dozens of people have participated in a gay pride event in highly conservative Montenegro where authorities are promising to boost gay rights as part of efforts to join the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of people have participated in a gay pride event in highly conservative Montenegro where authorities are promising to boost gay rights as part of efforts to join the European Union.
